resources.string:
Adoption Fees:
Kittens under 1 year old - $60
Cats over 1 year old - $50
Ambassador pets have a raised adoption fee that helps lend a paw to other pets looking for a forever home. 
All of our adoptable animals are up to date on vaccinations, spayed/neutered, de-wormed, microchipped, and free of parasites such as fleas and ticks. 
Upon adoption, new pet parents are sent home with their new cat's first 6 months of heartworm prevention, city license, a starter bag of H-E-B Heritage Ranch food, and a voucher for a free wellness exam at participating veterinarians.
